channel.title: urban planning on ERIC WANG
channel.description: Recent content in urban planning on ERIC WANG

item.title: @MINISTRY OF ENVIRONMENT - How to urban plan with data science ?
item.description: At the ministry of Environment and more especially at the local administration of Val d'Oise department, I learn to manage and to tackle local housing policy.

item.title: @POPUPURBAIN - Sephora is taking Belleville, does it mean the end of it ?
item.description: Web article written during 2015 for a consulting office called pop-up urbain specialised in urbain foresight and social-media.

item.title: @MAYOR OF PARIS - How do we access water in Paris ?
item.description: The Mairie de Paris is working to reduce the sensation of heat (cf. urban heat island phenomena) and has initiated a feasibility study for access to water with a group from the Paris 1 sustainable development master's programme in order to quantify the exact needs. This study contributed to the opening in 2017 of the innovative open-water swimming pool at the Villette basin.

item.title: @SNCF - How to size new line regarding Paris' evolution in 2030 ?
item.description: Internship made at SNCF in collaboration with l'Institut de la Région Île-de-France regarding the impact of 2 new lines, today and in 2030.
